name: Dickson Street Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are thinking of moving to Fayetteville, and stopped at the The Common Ground coffee shop for a capuchino and to charge a cell phone. We had originally planned to find a motel near downtown, but saw that the Dickson Street Inn was located nearby. Since we wanted to scout out the town anyway, we walked by and climbed the stairs to the attached wine bar, a great view of downtown.
reviews.title: A+ location, right in the heart of the action, but peaceful and serene

description: A small inn in the heart of downtown Fayetteville, the Dickson Street Inn offers a unique boutique hotel experience that's within walking distance of the most popular nightlife venues in town.
